allow:
Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Add Imperial custom proposal with enhanced Tractis branding

- Create custom Imperial proposal component for Aureon Connect product
- Add Imperial branding assets \(logo and favicon extracted via Dembrandt\)
- Remove unrealistic features: 30-day pilot and 40-hour training
- Enhance Tractis visibility throughout proposal:
  * Prominent "Powered by Tractis" badge in hero section
  * Tractis attribution in Aureon Connect middleware diagram
  * Tractis logo in tech section
  * Compact footer with Tractis branding and tractis.ai link
- Implement modern animations with Framer Motion
- Add Spanish localized content focused on business value
- Configure pay-per-use pricing model \(per order processed\)
- Include visual flow diagram showing TMS integration architecture

Co-Authored-By: Claude Sonnet 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")

Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Add missing fixed-sections.ts file for proposals

- Add TRACTIS_CONTACT with company contact information
- Add TRACTIS_WHY_US with company expertise and track record
- Add FIXED_SECTION_VARIANTS for default section variants
- Required by proposals.ts for consistent branding across proposals

Co-Authored-By: Claude Sonnet 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")
